attributes.action: pressure on UN to ban knee on neck practice in arrest
attributes.additional_details: Because in certain coutries the techniique is acceptable & predominanty used against minorities who are considered disruptive. These people may not be innocent of crimes but they do not deserve to die before they face a court for fair trial
attributes.background: Put pressure on the UN to have the practice declared illegal

rejection.details:
The United Nations does not make decisions about how police operate in different countries. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:
Review the use of force against BAME people by the police - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329599
